name: Amenli
headline: Offers insurance to customers in a convenient & transparent way
description: Amenli is the first licensed online insurance broker in Egypt. Egypt has one of the lowest insurance penetrations in the world with a 100m population and a $2B GWP market growing 20+% YoY and a potential TAM of $10B. Over the past few months, Amenli issued 500+ policies in less than 10 mins compared to the minimum of 3 weeks industry standard. Amenli co-founders, Shady & Adham were founding team members of Paymob, one of the fastest growing payment companies in MENA. Shady was CCO and Adham was its Tech Lead and they worked together for more than 3 years to scale-up Paymob from scratch to 50K+ merchants, 5 countries and dozens of millions of monthly transactions.

founders.name: Shady El Tohfa, Founder
founders.description:
Shady is Co-founder of Amenli, an insurtech startup in Egypt. Prior to Amenli, he was part of the founding team and CCO of Paymob since 2015 and helped the company reach tens of thousands of merchants, processing millions of transactions and with operations across 5 markets. 

He also co-founded the Business Association at AUC. He was Entrepreneur-in-Residence at Skydeck, the startup accelerator of UC Berkeley in the US. Shady holds a B.A. in Business Administration from AUC.

founders.name: Adham Nauman, Founder
founders.description: Adham is Co-founder and CTO of Amenli, an insurtech startup in Egypt. Prior to Amenli, he was part of the founding team of Paymob since 2016 where he was Tech Lead. There, he helped build the infrastructure processing millions of transactions and used by more than 50k merchants.

كيف تعمل
التعويضات
قدم علي تعويضك في أي وقت بسهولة 
اتصل أو أرسل شات لفريق أمنلي 
أمنلي هتساعدك في كل الخطوات لتسهل عليك 
هنوجهك و نساعدك في كل الإجراءات عشان تاخد تعويضك 
[اتصل بنا](https://www.amenli.com/<tel:16887>)
عنا
أمنلي هي شركة وساطة تأمينية مرخصة من هيئة الرقابة المالية سنة 2019. هدفنا هو حمايتك من الأخطار المحتملة والتخفيف من أعبائك المالية عن طريق تقديم جميع أنواع التأمين المقدم من كبرى شركات التأمين العالمية والمحلية. أمنلي بتقدملك أسهل وأسرع تجربة تأمين عشان تستفيد بتأمين طبي محلي أو دولي ليك ولأسرتك، تأمين عالسيارة، عالبيت أو حتى للشركة في خلال ثواني ومن مكانك.
![logo](https://www.amenli.com/assets/svg/whitelogoar.svg)
في حالة عدم رضائك عن الخدمة يحق لك تصعيد الشكوى الى مقر الهيئة العامة للرقابة المالية أو عبر موقعها الإلكتروني 
[www.fra.gov.eg ](https://www.amenli.com/<www.fra.gov.eg>)

generated_description:
Amenli is an innovative Egyptian insurance company that aims to simplify and enhance the insurance experience for its customers. Launched in 2020, they proudly hold the title of the first licensed online insurance broker in Egypt. This is significant, especially given Egypt's historically low insurance penetration of just 1%—a stark contrast against a population of 100 million and a growing $2 billion insurance market.

With co-founders Shady and Adham at the helm, both of whom previously played pivotal roles at Paymob—a leading payments platform in the MENA region—Amenli is well-equipped to make a mark in the insurance landscape. Their past experience helped them quickly establish Amenli, which, in just a short time, has issued over 500 insurance policies in a record-breaking time of under 10 minutes, compared to the industry standard of about three weeks.

The mission of Amenli is straightforward: to offer insurance in a way that is both convenient and transparent. They provide a diverse range of services, including medical, automotive, home, and business insurance, catering to both local and international needs.

Headquartered in Cairo, the company has expanded to a team of 65 employees and continues to harness the principles of cutting-edge technology to enhance user experience. They are backed by Y Combinator (Batch S21) and have received guidance from Aaron Epstein, their Group Partner.

In a market set to grow at over 20% annually and a total addressable market of $10 billion, Amenli is not just an insurer; it's a pioneer aiming to reshape how insurance is perceived in Egypt. For anyone interested in their services or wanting to get in touch, they maintain an engaging online presence through their website [Amenli](https://www.amenli.com/) and various social media platforms.

In summary, Amenli is steering Egyptian insurance into the digital age, ensuring that customers have access to swift and straightforward insurance solutions. They aren't just filling a gap in the market; they are redefining the insurance experience as a whole.
